{"blocks":[{"key":"2820r","text":"10% Unclarified V8 Agar","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"876kk","text":"Combine 100 ml V8 juice and 900 ml of distilled water.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fa4db","text":"Add 1g CaCO3and 0.05 g b-sitosterol and mix well. Leave stir bar in the flask for later mixing.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":11,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"190bk","text":"Add 15g of agar.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7npid","text":"Autoclave at 15 psi for 20 minutes.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6vuk2","text":"Stir medium while dispensing to insure good mixing of CaCO3.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":58,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aufpj","text":"20% : 200 ml V8, 800ml d. water, 2g CaCO3, and 0.05g b-sitosterol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":40,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ad822","text":"15% : 150 ml V8, 850 ml d. water, 1.5g CaCO3, and 0.05g b-sitosterol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":43,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cl74f","text":"Reference: Miller, P. M. 1955. V-8 juice agar as a general purpose medium for fungi and bacteria. Phytopathology 45:461-462.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
